description:
Light and Shadow

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Story

Duality has always existed, life and death, good and evil, light and darkness.

But one daylight and darkness decided to work together for a greater good.

Everyone knew that some things could only survive in nuance.

So they chose two champions to work together and so...

...break the duality between them.

----------

How to play

Movement: WASD / Gamepad Joystick

Jump:  Space/ Gamepad (A)

Pickup/Throw: E/ Gamepad (Y)

----------

Rules

Both players should help each other to reach a point on the map.

There are a lot of intractable items to do this, for example:

-Lamps

-Switches

-Rocks

-Movable objects

If the shadow player walks inside the light, it will die and vice-versa.
